entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.45.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Major updates üöÄ

  • [improvement] New Grid System, New Code Editor and AppDef Phase 2 by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.44.0...v2.45.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: CE-LTS-2.50.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable drag on calender popup and unblock other input interactions by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9898
  • Fix : Table is crashing on copy , not able to delete table columns by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9902
  • fix: Bugfixes on LTS from app builder by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9894

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/CE-LTS-2.50.0...CE-LTS-2.50.1

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.60.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • Feature: pages sidebar collapsable and pin functionality in preview/release mode by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9650
  • Add support to add Manual date entry in Datepicker table column by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9631
  • Add support to wrap table's column header by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9565
  • feat: Button component revamp by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8361
  • fix: resize page width on window resize by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9164
  • feat: Checkbox + Toggle revamp by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/8519
  • fix : Toggle switch import fix by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9874
  • Bugfix: Filter order for toggle component in new and old version in widget manager by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9879

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Fixes Built with Tooljet" watermark and app mode switcher appear briefly before the correct login page loads. by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9545
  • Fix: headers and action button UI on table by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9626
  • fix: delete all children and nested children on component delete by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9182
  • Fix duplicate text appearing at the bottom from the previous page in PDF widget by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9567
  • chore: Remove vulnerabilities in FE packages by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9561
  • chore: Removed unused packages in FE by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9161
  • Fix Pagination and order of rows malfunction if default selected Id is not on page 1 by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9651
  • hotfix : Form csa for onsubmit not getting triggered by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9862
  • Added cypress test cases for user invite flow by @ajith-k-v in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9838
  • Added cypress test cases for private app redirection for a non existing‚Ä¶ by @ajith-k-v in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9891
  • fix: disable drag on calender popup and unblock other input interactions by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9898
  • Fix : Table is crashing on copy , not able to delete table columns by @stepinfwd in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9902
  • Fix: Handling of missing plugin_id in oauth data source parsing by @parthy007 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9907
  • Hotfix: OAuth flow for core plugins by @akshaysasidrn in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9912
  • fix: update animateTransform for cross browser compatibility by @johnsoncherian in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9917
  • Fix color transitions on sidebar pages in dark mode by @vjaris42 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9920
  • Fix table all column editable by @nakulnagargade in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/9921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.45.0...v2.60.0
